DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial compare ability three different dos pegaptanib sodium safely effectively minimize fluid leakage within eye , thereby stabilize improve vision patient wet AMD . The study also examine effect pegaptanib sodium cornea sensory retina patient wet AMD .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Explore Safety Efficacy Three Different Doses Pegaptanib Sodium Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD )
DOC.criteria: Subjects either gender , age 50 year great . Subfoveal choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) due AMD . Best correct visual acuity study eye 20/40 20/320 . Normal electroretinogram , corneal endothelial cell density 1500 cells/mm2 . Any prior photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) Visudyne thermal laser study eye .
